| icon           = poe2 fragments_whispers_of_yenwood icon.png
| description    = Despite being utterly destroyed with the devastation of Caed Nua, the sword known as the Whispers of Yenwood has once again found its way into the possession of the keep's Roadwarden, albeit in pieces. It would take a smith of some talent to reforge the weapon. With the right materials, however, perhaps the sword could become even greater than it once was.

'''{{Pagename nd}}''' is a {{lc:Misc}} in {{poe2}}.

##  Description 

{{Description |{{#var:description}}}}

##  Acquisition 

{{#arraymap: {{#var:location}}|;|x|x|\n}}

## Usage

* This item can be restored to the [Whispers of Yenwood](/whispersOfYenwoodDeadfire/) for {{cp2|1500}} by [Marihi](/marihi/) of [Periki's Overlook](/perikisOverlook/) in [Neketaka](/neketaka/).
* If you also have the [Fragments of Blade of the Endless Paths](/fragmentsOfBladeOfTheEndlessPaths/), they can instead be combined into the [Whispers of the Endless Paths](/whispersOfTheEndlessPaths/) for {{cp2|3000}}.
